result.execSummary:
The defendant Anthony L. Clark was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Paid direct to Clerk of Courts by 12-03-2015

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Anthony L. Clark

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Anthony Lionel Clark in court with attorney Jack C. Hoag.  Scott H. Dirks appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Amended information filed. No contest to count 2. Court finds defendant guilty. Count 1 dismissed and read in. Court withholds sentence and places defendant to 1 year probation. Court orders any treatment. Costs due 12-3-15. Credit for 3 days.

Defendant Anthony L. Clark in court with attorney Jack C. Hoag.  Cheniqua White appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Waived jury trial F&V  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 29, 2015 at 08:00 am.

Defendant Anthony L. Clark in court with attorney Jack C. Hoag.  Richard Jay Sullivan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 17, 2015 at 11:00 am.  Jury selection scheduled for September 21, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for September 21, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Calendar call on July 23, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Anthony L. Clark in court with attorney Jack C. Hoag.  Mason C. Braunschweig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives preliminary hearing freely and voluntarily.  Court accepts waiver and binds the Defendant over for the filing of an Information.  Information filed, copy to Defendant, reading waived.  Defendant stands mute, not guilty plea entered by court, jury trial to be set.

Defendant Anthony L. Clark in court with attorney Jack C. Hoag.  Gwanny J. Tjoa appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Preliminary hearing requested, TIME LIMITS WAIVED.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 8, 2015 at 08:45 am.

Defendant Anthony L. Clark in court in custody with attorney Jason Mitchel Daane.  Katharine Buker appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint filed, copy to Defendant, penalties advised, rights given, reading waived.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 20, 2015, at 1:00 pm.
May not possess any weapons or firearms.
